description: Main entry point for a Flutter app that displays a simple user interface with a title, a message, and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title passed as a parameter.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds UI including AppBar and body with message and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, calls runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage.
